query:
SELECT id, tenantId, providerType, providerName, LENGTH(accessToken) as accessTokenLength, LENGTH(refreshToken) as refreshTokenLength, tokenExpiresAt 
FROM paymentProviders 
WHERE tenantId = 'test-tenant-123'
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3VZWkmDdVMGTAoV.53e2061c2123 --database FUrq59UAJ9LE4f7MefV9tg --execute SELECT id, tenantId, providerType, providerName, LENGTH(accessToken) as accessTokenLength, LENGTH(refreshToken) as refreshTokenLength, tokenExpiresAt 
FROM paymentProviders 
WHERE tenantId = 'test-tenant-123'
